attributes.action: Introduce politics to the primary and secondary curriculum
attributes.background: Information on politics received in secondary education leaves students with a lack of understanding and a disinterest in the subject. Therefore they find it unapproachable and so are left unable to make informed decisions. We feel this should be changed by implementing compulsory politics classes.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104426

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
